Items.Title: Application no. N 130105 ZRM submitted by the Department of City Planning, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, concerning Article I, Chapter 3 (Comprehensive Off-Street Parking Regulations in Community Districts 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8 in the Borough of Manhattan and Portions of Community Districts 1 and 2 in the Borough of Queens), and various other Sections, modifying the regulations governing off-street parking and loading in Manhattan Community Districts 1 through 8.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Regulations governing off-street parking and loading in Manhattan. (N 130105 ZRM)

Items.Title: Application No. 20135519 RSY for resolution authorizing an amendment to a previously executed agreement between the Mayor and Council establishing a Special Process for City Council Review and Approval of the “Coney Island Amusement Park Project Plan,” Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 13, Council District 47.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: “Coney Island Amusement Park Project Plan”. (20135519 RSY)

Items.Title: Application No. 20135519 RSY for resolution authorizing an amendment to a previously executed agreement between the Mayor and Council establishing a Special Process for City Council Review and Approval of the “Coney Island Amusement Park Project Plan,” Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 13, Council District 47.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Subcommittee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be P-C Item Approved by Subcommittee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: “Coney Island Amusement Park Project Plan”. (20135519 RSY)
